CustomField.formula: IF( (Marks__c * 100) >=50 && (Marks__c * 100) <= 64 , 'Pass', IF( (Marks__c * 100) >=65 && (Marks__c * 100) <= 74 , 'Credit', IF( (Marks__c * 100) >=75 && (Marks__c * 100) <= 84 , 'Distinction', IF( (Marks__c * 100) >=85 && (Marks__c * 100) <= 100 , ' High Distinction', '')) ) )
CustomField.label: Marks Description
